TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MessageBoxOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies special display options for a message box.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions DefaultDesktopOnly = int32(131072)

Docs.summary: The message box is displayed on the default desktop of the interactive window station. Specifies that the message box is displayed from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] windows service application in order to notify the user of an event.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions RightAlign = int32(524288)

Docs.summary: The message box text and title bar caption are right-aligned.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions RtlReading = int32(1048576)

Docs.summary: All text, buttons, icons, and title bars are displayed right-to-left.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.MessageBoxOptions ServiceNotification = int32(2097152)

Docs.summary: The message box is displayed on the currently active desktop even if a user is not logged on to the computer. Specifies that the message box is displayed from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] windows service application in order to notify the user of an event.
